Nuria, vive con su familia y dos hijos, ella es madre soltera, se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad, este negocio lo logro instalar con su familia, lo atiende de 8:00am hasta las 9:00pm.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materiales que son demandados por los clientes, por ejemplo: aceite, arroz, frijoles, embutidos, boquitas, dulces, este crédito le ayudara para tener una tienda más competente, ya que mejorara sus ingresos. 
Sus aspiraciones es adquirir un vehículo para uso familiar y para el negocio, además de realizarle mejoras a la vivienda.
texts.en:
Nuria lives with her family and two children. She is a single mother who makes her living selling convenience store items. She managed to set up this business with her family, running it from 8:00am to 9:00pm. 

She is seeking a loan to buy the goods demanded by the customers, e.g. oil, rice, beans, sausages, snacks and sweets. This loan will help her to have a better store as it will improve her income. Her dreams are to buy a vehicle for family and business use, as well as to make improvements to her home.

loans.use: to buy oil, rice, beans, sausages, snacks and sweets.

loans.name: Mohamad

texts.en: Mohamad is a 41-year-old married man and a father of one child. He has been selling frozen chicken since 2010. Mohamad is a hard worker who seeks perfection in his business to please his customers. That's why he applied for a loan from Kiva' partner Al Majmoua, in order to expand his business through starting selling fresh chicken and frozen fish. He is so ambitious that he is willing to expand his business more and more in the future through opening a butchery where he sells fresh meat, fish and chicken.

loans.use: to buy fresh chicken and frozen fish that he will start selling in his shop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Gantsooj

texts.en: Gantsooj is 33 years old and lives in a small wooden house in Darkhan City with his wife and two children. His wife works at a local hospital as a nurse, and his daughter, nine, attends a local school. His son, who is two, goes to a local kindergarten. In the night time, Gantsooj has been operating a taxi service since October 2007 beyond his gas fitter career. He is seeking a loan to buy a new smokeless stove for his recently built house. Gantsooj is a very hardworking person and he would like to express appreciation to Kiva!

loans.use: To buy a new smokeless stove for his house.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Julio, está solicitando un préstamo por la necesidad de realizar una nueva siembra, en la cual deberá aplicar los insumos tales como: abono, herbicidas, insecticidas que son tan necesarios para que todo el trabajo que realiza no sea en vano, que al contrario pueda dar buenos frutos, Julio como cada Agricultor está deseoso de poder recibir una buena cosecha.
Con el préstamo anterior comenta que le sirvió para pagar el abono, herbicias, el alquiler del terreno, realizar la siembra de maíz y frijol, y cancelo de las ganancias que le quedo al vender parte de la cosecha.
texts.en:
Julio is requesting a loan because he needs to plant a new crop. He is in need of supplies such as compost, herbicides, and insecticides so that his work is not done in vain and results in a fruitful harvest. Like any farmer, Julio wants to achieve good results.

With his previous loan, Julio says he was able to buy compost, herbicides, as well as pay the rent on his farmland. He planted corn and beans and paid off his loan using the profits from selling part of his harvest.

loans.use: to buy compost, herbicides, and insecticides.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Jorge De Jesus

texts.es:
Jorge, está realizando su cultivo de granos básicos, por eso solicita un préstamo que le permita invertir en la compra de insumos agrícolas para aplicarlos, 5 sacos de abono y herbicidas, que son de vital importancia para aplicarlos.
Con el préstamo anterior manifiesta logro hacer una buena inversión, de la cual recibió una buena cosecha, espera que esta nueva compra le de los resultados mejores, en su familia su situación económica se mantiene, cuentan con todo lo necesario, está muy satisfecha del trabajo de Kiva.
texts.en:
Jorge is growing bulk grains, which is why he is seeking a loan which will enable him to invest in the purchase of agricultural supplies: 5 bags of fertilizers and herbicides which are extremely important to apply them. 

He states that with the previous loan he has made a good investment, with which he secured a good harvest. He hopes that this new purchase will give him the best results that his family's financial situation remains stable, that they have all that they need. Jorge is very satisfied with Kiva's work.

loans.use: to buy 5 bags of herbicide and fertilizers.

loans.name: David Alexander

texts.es:
David, vive con su esposa y un hijo, él es empleado de la alcaldía de la localidad, en su familia se administra una venta de pupusas y venta de bebidas refrescantes, este negocio lo atiende su esposa  y él ayuda  solo después del trabajo, lo instalaron por cuenta propia, tiene mas de dos años de existir.
Actualmente él necesita realizar la inversión en la compra de mercadería para poder aumentar la disponibilidad en el inventario, comprándose aceite, bolsas, papel, maíz, condimentos, quesillo, gaseosas, gas, además mejoraran el local donde instala la venta de las pupusas, por eso solicita un préstamo que le permita realizar la inversión, ayudando a su esposa para que se desarrolle mejor en la venta.
Para David uno de sus propósitos es mejorar el local, ampliándolo, comprarse más mesas, aumentar la capacidad con una plancha mas grande, ya que estará desarrollando el negocio y los ingresos para su hogar.
texts.en:
David lives with his wife and son and is an employee of the local mayor's office. His family sells pupusas and soft drinks. His wife manages the business; he helps her after work. They started the business themselves more than two years ago. Now David needs to buy supplies to maintain a larger inventory; he will buy oil, bags, paper, corn, condiments, processed cheese, gas, and sodas. He will also make improvements to the area where they sell the pupusas.

He is applying for a loan to make these investments, which will help his wife increase sales. David wants to renovate and expand the space, buy more tables, and increase output with a larger grill. They will be building the business and their household income.

loans.use: to buy oil, bags, paper, corn, condiments, processed cheese, and sodas.

loans.name: Ilse

texts.es: Me llamo Ilse vivo en San Carlos, Costa Rica, soy  madre de tres niños, tengo un abastecedor (tienda de abarrotes) el cual es la única fuente de ingreso en mi familia, necesito surtirlo ya que tengo poca mercadería que ofrecer a mis clientes, estoy solicitando un millón treinta y cinco mil colones (¢1.035.0000) para comprar más  productos y brindar un mejor servicio a la comunidad, gracias a este proyecto de crédito local  lograré mi meta y mejoraré la calidad de vida propia y de mis hijos, ¡se que lo alcanzaré, si ustedes me ayudan!
texts.en: Ilse lives in San Carlos, Costa Rica, and is the mother of three children. She owns a grocery store, which is her family's sole source of income. She needs to stock it as she has little merchandise to offer her customers. She is requesting a loan for 1,035,000 colones to buy more items and provide better service to the community. She says that thanks to the loan she will meet her goal and improve her and her family's circumstances. She feels she will achieve this with the help of the lenders.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her grocery store.

loans.name: Rina Indira

texts.es: Rina tiene 45 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos y vive en una Colonia Suburbana de la Ciudad de San Pedro Sula. Rina tiene su negocio de pulpería donde vende productos de la canasta básica familiar, como ser: carnes, churros, refrescos, medicinas, verduras, condimentos y otros. Ella quiere surtir su negocio y para eso solicito un préstamo a ODEF por 5,000 Lempiras y lo invertirá en productos de la canasta básica familiar, medicinas y otros para mantener surtido su negocio y obtener los ingresos que necesita para su hogar. Su meta es seguir ayudando a sus hijos con los gastos del estudio y mantener el negocio para obtener sus propios ingresos.
texts.en: Rina, 45, is married and has two children.  She lives in a suburban neighborhood in the city of San Pedro Sula.  Rina has a grocery store where she sells basic staple items like meat, snacks, soft-drinks, medicine, vegetables, condiments and others.  She needs to stock her store and this is why she’s asking ODEF for a 5,000 Lempira loan to buy basic staples, medicine and others to keep her store stocked to earn the income she needs for her home.  Her goal is to continue helping her children with schooling costs and to stay in business in order to earn income of her own.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store (soft-drinks, vegetables, meat, condiments, snacks, medicine, etc.)

loans.name: Maqsud

texts.ru: Максуд житель города Исфара. Ему 35 лет. Он женат. У него один ребенок. Жена Максуда домохозяйка. Максуд имеет среднее образование. Он на протяжении восьми лет занимается торговлей. Он покупает и продает сухофрукты (курагу и финики). Максуд просит кредит для покупки сухофруктов.
texts.en: Maqsud lives in the city of Isfara. He is 35 years old, married, and has a child. His wife takes care of the household. Maqsud has secondary education, and for the past eight years has been engaged in commerce. He buys and resells dried fruits (apricots and dates). Maqsud is requesting a loan to purchase dried fruits.

loans.use: to buy dried fruits

loans.name: Yurvy Carolina

texts.es:
Carolina tiene 21 año es soltera y no tiene hijos. Cuando Carolina termino el colegio empezó a buscar trabajo por toda la ciudad y no obtuvo ningún resultado en vista de que sus esperanzas por obtener un trabajo se desvanecieron opto por incursionar en el negocio de las ventas de productos cosméticos y bisutería. 

En la actualidad el trabajo lo realiza sola desde el lunes hasta domingo y utiliza  métodos para vender. 
Sus productos son vendidos a familiares, amigos y clientes nuevo directamente en sus domicilios. 

Tiene muchas aspiraciones con sus ventas por eso quiere el prestamo para comprar cosmeticos, perfumes, cremas etc. Su meta es tener una tienda de ropa y productos de belleza también desea que sus ingresos mejoren ya que es su único sustento otra de sus metas es estudiar en una universidad desea ser una excelente profesional.
texts.en:
Carolina, 21, is single and has no children.  When Carolina completed high-school she started looking for employment all over the city but had no luck and when she saw that her hopes of becoming employed evaporate she opted for starting a business selling cosmetics and costume jewelry.  She currently works at this alone from Monday to Sunday and uses various selling methodologies.  She sells her products to family members, friends and new customers directly in their homes.

She’s attached many hopes to her sales and this is why she wants a loan to buy cosmetics, perfume, creams, etc.  Her goal is to have a clothing and beauty products store and she wants her income to improve since this is her only means of support.  Another of her goals is to attend university and become an excellent professional.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, perfume and creams.

loans.name: Dilbar

texts.ru:
Дилбар родилась и проживает в городе Вахдат. Ей 35 лет. Она замужем. У нее двое детей. Дилбар имеет среднее образование. Она более четырех лет занималась торговлей свадебных национальных платьев на рынке. Вот уже семь лет Дилбар открыла салон свадебных платьев. Она сдает в аренду национальные свадебные и бальные платья. 
Дилбар берет кредит для приобретения новых видов свадебных платьев и головных уборов с целью увеличения ассортимента товара.
texts.en:
Dilbar was born and lives in the city of Vahdat. She is 35 years old, married, and has two children. Dilbar has secondary education. For over four years, she sold traditional wedding dresses at a market and then, seven years ago, she opened her own wedding dress salon. She rents out traditional wedding and ball gowns.

Dilbar is taking this loan to purchase new styles of wedding dresses and headwear in order to expand the assortment of her merchandise.

loans.use: to buy new styles of wedding dresses and headwear

loans.name: Javier

texts.es: Soy Javier vivo en la zona rural de San Carlos, Costa Rica, anhelo terminar mi casa, quiero que mi esposa y mis hijos habiten en  una vivienda digna, me he esforzado para lograrlo, sin embargo necesito un préstamo por un millón de colones (¢1.000.000) para concluirla, el cual usaré para comprar cemento, zinc, perlin y otros materiales . Creo que esta es mi gran oportunidad de lograrlo. Agradezco a este proyecto  de crédito local el hacer nuestros sueños una realidad.
texts.en:
I am Javier and I live in the rural area of San Carlos, Costa Rica. I yearn for to finish my house, I want my wife and children to live in a decent house. I've tried very hard to achieve it, however I need a loan for a million colones (¢  1,000,000) to finish it. I will use the loan to buy cement, zinc, gravel, and other materials.

I think this is my big opportunity to make it. I thank this project of local loans for making our dreams become a reality.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for finish his house.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma, a 34-year-old tailor in Mombasa, is married to Harun and a mother of three children. She has been sewing clothes for her customers for the past ten years. She is doing great.

This will be Fatuma’s fourth loan from KADET LTD, with which she plans to purchase a new sewing machine, sewing threads and clothing materials. She will use the anticipated profits to educate her children and repay her loan.

She hopes to be a successful business woman.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine, sewing threads and clothing materials.

loans.name: Luz Maria

texts.es: Luz María, tiene 28 años de edad, es casada, tiene una hija y vive en el municipio de Morazan, Yoro.  Ella tiene su propio negocio de venta de helados como conos, ice crean, paletas, copitas, y golosinas como confites y chicles de toda clase, churros galletas etc. el negocio lo tiene establecido desde hace 4 años en un local que alquila en el centro de la ciudad. El préstamo que ha solicitado actualmente es el tercer ciclo y es por 25,000 lempiras, con el cual comprara más producto para la venta. Quiere mantener surtido de dulces y helados para poder incrementar las ventas y sus ingresos. Su plan es aprovechar la oportunidad crediticia con ODEF para mejorar el negocio y ayudar el nivel de vida con su familia.
texts.en:
Luz María is 28 years old, married, and has a daughter. They live in the town of Morazan, Yoro.

Luz María has her own store where she sells frozen treats (cones, ice cream, popsicles, and ice cream cups), sweets (all types of candy and gum), donuts, cookies, and other items. She established this business four years ago and rents a shop in the central part of town. Luz María is currently requesting her third loan in the amount of 25,000 HNL. The money will be used to buy more products to sell. She wants to maintain her inventory of sweets and frozen treats so that she can increase her sales and her income.

Her plan is to take advantage of the credit opportunities offered by ODEF so that she can improve her business and her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to restock her store with a variety of sweets and frozen treats.

loans.name: Mercedes Anunciacion

texts.es:
La Concordia es un cantón de la Provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas que anteriormente pertenecía a la Provincia de Esmeraldas. Es considerado un cantón muy fuerte en la agroindustria y exportación de varios productos como palma africana, macadamia y palmito por lo cual un aproximado de más de 300 millones de dólares se mueven solo en este cantón. También el turismo es una fuente de economía, pues hay lugares que son visitados y los habitantes del pueblo aprovechan este movimiento para comercializar todo tipo de productos con negocios establecidos en cada rincón como restaurantes, tiendas, farmacias, almacenes de ropa, tours, etc. Mercedes es una de las emprendedoras que apostó por crecer económicamente en este cantón, es soltera,  tiene 50 años y vive con su pareja  Gustavo de 50 y un hijo de 11 años. 
Mercedes inició su negocio de venta de ropa casual hace 10 años, que aprendió por amigos que le recomendaron esta actividad. Ella viaja a ciudades a comprar la ropa al por mayor para conseguir en un mejor precio y dedica hasta 10 horas cada día en la atención a sus clientes. Se acercó a Fundación Alternativa en donde solicitó un préstamo con el que comprará más ropa para tener variedad y ofrecer a sus clientes ropa para todos los gustos y adecuados en la época del año. Con esto Mercedes incrementará sus ingresos con el que pueda educar a su hijo hasta que sea un profesional y además preveer un ahorro para sus necesidades cuando llegue a edad avanzada. Mercedes agradece la gestión de Fundación Alternativa por el apoyo que le brindan para el alcance de sus sueños.
texts.en:
La Concordia ia a canton in Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas province that formerly belonged to Esmeraldas province. The canton emphasizes agribusiness and exports $300 million worth of products such as African palm oil, macadamias, and hearts-of-palm. Tourism is also important to the economy. There are tourist sites where the residents can sell all kinds of items and many established businesses such as restaurants, shops, pharmacies, clothing stores, tour guides, and so forth. Mercedes is one of the entrepreneurs who bet on economic growth in the canton. She is single, 50, and lives with her partner Gustavo, who is 50, and their 11-year-old son.

Ten years ago, Mercedes started her casual clothing business, which she learned from friends who recommended the work. She travels to cities to buy wholesale clothing at a good price and spends ten hours a day waiting on her customers. She approached Fundación Alternativa for a loan that she will use to buy more variety of clothes and offer her customers clothes they will love for every season. With the investment, Mercedes will increase her income, which will help her pay for her son's education until he has a career and also provide savings for her later years. Mercedes thanks the management of Fundación Alternativa for its support in helping her realize her dreams.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Yonis

texts.es:
Yonis, está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materiales agrícolas, pues inicia sus cultivos de maíz y frijol, a los cuales le aplicara al momento de la siembra abono, herbicidas e insecticidas, para prevenirles las plagas y fortalecer la producción, esta aplicación será para una segunda cosecha que el espera.
Manifiesta que con estos préstamos su trabajo en el campo ha sido verdaderamente mejor, comprándose los insumos agrícolas para la primera cosecha, de esta logro vender una parte.
texts.en:
Yonis is requesting a loan in order to buy farming supplies. He has started planting corn and beans, so he plans to apply compost, herbicides, and insecticides to prevent pests and to strengthen his crops. These supplies will be for the second crop that he is expecting.

Yonis says that these loans have truly improved his work in the fields. He purchased farming supplies for his first crop and repaid his previous loan by selling part of his harvest.

loans.use: to buy compost, herbicides, and insecticides.

loans.name: Ana Ramona

texts.es:
Ana tiene 47 años, empezó a trabajar desde muy pequeña ya que sus padres se dedicaban al comercio y siempre le inculcaron valores y principios, sobre todo le enseñaron que tenia que ser una persona muy responsable y trabajadora. 

Ana decidió tener su propio negocio ya que quedo con sus hijos pequeños y tenia que pagar gastos. En la actualidad sus hijos son adultos y pueden trabajar para sus propios gastos. 
Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa y artículos de bazar. Trabaja con el apoyo de su hija de lunes a domingos de 8:00 am hasta 10 pm. Una de las dificultades que tiene es que el sector donde ella vive no esta pavimentado  y también hay mucha delincuencia. 

Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio por eso quiere el prestamo para comprar ropa y articulos de bazar. su meta es tener un bazar grande y comprar vitrinas para incrementar el negocio para así atender cumplir con la necesidad del cliente.
texts.en:
Ana, age 47, began working at a very young age since her parents were in the retail trade. They always instilled in her values and principles. Above all, they taught her how to be a responsible and hardworking person.

Ana decided to start her own business when she had to look after her small children and pay for the expenses. Her children are now adults and are able to work to pay for their own expenses. Ana sells clothing and bazaar merchandise. She works with the help of her daughter Monday through Sunday from 8 A.M. to 10 P.M. One of the difficulties that she must deal with is that the area where she lives is not paved. This is also frequent crime in the area.

Ana has many aspirations for her business, so she wants to use this loan to buy clothing and bazaar merchandise. Her goal is to have a large bazaar and to buy display cabinets so that she can expand her business. This will allow her to meet the needs of her customers.

loans.use: to buy clothing and bazaar merchandise.

loans.name: Trinidad Antonio

texts.es: Trinidad Antonio  de 69 anos de edad, casado con 3 hijos mayores de edad, independiente económicamente, pertenece al municipio de corinto. El cual esta ubicado en la zona de occidente del  país y se caracteriza por ser un lugar costero donde su actividad principal es la pesca, es un lugar muy turísticos por sus puertos. El sr. Trinidad tiene por actividad económica una pulpería, y  venta de cuajada ubicada en su casa de habitación y de forma ambulante, tiene 32 anos de tener dicha actividad económica, la cual inicio con la venta de cuajada en la actualidad abastece a la gran mayoría de pulperías y ventas del puerto de Corinto aprovechando el lugar donde se encuentra su casa ubicado, ya que costado norte de sus casa se encuentra ubicado la Marina de Guerra a quienes les vende sus productos. Trinidad Antonio ya ha trabajado con fundación león 2000 el cual ha demostrado ser responsable con sus pagos en tiempo y forma. El objetivo del préstamo es  para invertir en capital de trabajo, y surtir más su pulpería y poder satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes. Una pulpería es una tienda donde se venden productos en cantidades menores como una bolsita de champo, una  caja de fosforo, una libra de azúcar, pan por unidad, tiste, hielo. Trinidad agradece la oportunidad que los prestamistas kiva le brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua.
texts.en:
Trinidad Antonio, 69, is married and has three adult children who are economically independent.  He’s from the town of Corinto that’s located in the west of the country and is noted for being a coastal place whose main activity is fishing; because of its ports it’s a very touristy zone.

Trinidad’s economic activity is a grocery store and he also sells milk curd at home and from place to place.  He’s been in this economic activity for 32 years.  He started it with the milk curd sales and he currently supplies the majority of grocery stores and sales points in the port of Corinto.  He takes advantage of his house’s location since just north of it is the navy base and he sells his products to it.

Trinidad Antonio has worked in the past with Fundación León 2000 and he’s been responsible and punctual with his payments.  The objective of this loan is to invest in working capital to stock his store more and be able to meet customer demand. 

A ‘pulpería’ grocery store is a shop where products like little bags of shampoo or a single box of matches, a pound of sugar or a single bread roll, cornmeal/cocoa powder mix and ice are sold in small quantities.  Trinidad is grateful for the opportunity Kiva lenders are providing for people of scarce resources and poor countries like Nicaragua.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for his grocery store.

loans.name: Yanely De La Paz

texts.es:
Yanely, vive con sus hijas, es madre soltera, es empleada mostrando mercadería, además se dedica a la venta de lociones y productos de belleza, este negocio comenzó como una oportunidad generadora de ingresos para ella y su familia, por esta misma situación desea invertir en la compra de mercadería.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de diversidad de lociones con fragancias ricas para los clientes, tambien comprarse un lote de mercadería como labiales, cremas, maquillaje, con esta inversión tendrá lo necesario para mejorar el inventario, ofreciendo variedad de mercadería.
 El objetivo de Yanely es mejorar su estilo de vida, gracias a su esfuerzo trabajando de distintas formas honradas y a través de los financiamientos.
texts.en:
Yanely is a single mother who lives with her daughters. She is employed as a product demonstrator. In addition, she sells lotions and beauty products. Yanely started this business as an opportunity to generate income for herself and her family.

At the moment, she wants to invest in merchandise so she is requesting a loan in order to buy a variety of scented lotions for her customers. She will also buy a shipment of merchandise that includes lipsticks, crèmes, and makeup. With this investment, she will have what she needs to improve her inventory and provide a variety of merchandise.

Yanely’s goal is to improve her lifestyle through honest work and the help of the loans.

loans.use: to buy lotions, lipsticks, crèmes, and makeup.

loans.name: Tobias Group

texts.es: Doña María, es miembro del Grupo Solidario Tobias, tiene 35 años de edad, es madre soltera de cuatro hijos, es una persona agradable, respetuosa y trabajadora, su meta es ver a sus  hijos profesionales y trabajando. Ella inicio desde hace doce años su negocio con la venta de ropa interior por encargo y en la actualidad se dedica a la venta de ropa y zapatos. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de  ropa y zapatos, sobretodo estilos que estén a la moda, de manera que pueda aumentar sus ventas llamando la atención de más clientes. Con el apoyo del préstamo tendrá más mercadería y así podrá aumentar sus ganancias y de esta forma mejorar la economía de su hogar. Una de sus dificultades es que tiene que dejar a sus hijos solos ya que sus ventas las realiza de forma ambulante. Su  mayor sueño es tener una tiendita en su casa y tiene como meta lograrlo con el apoyo de los préstamos de FAMA. Es el primer préstamo que doña María  recibe de FAMA y espera cancelar  sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en:
María’s a member of the “Tobías” support group.  She’s 35-years-old and a single mother of four children.  She’s pleasant, respectful and hardworking.  Her goal is to see her children become professionals and employed.  

She started her business selling underwear to order twelve years ago and at present she sells clothes and shoes.  She requests the loan to buy clothes and shoes especially in styles that are in fashion so that sales will increase when more customers are attracted.  With support from the loan she’ll have more merchandise and will be able to increase profits thus improving household economy.

One of her difficulties is that she has to leave her children alone because she does her sales from place to place.  Her greatest dream is to have a little store at home and her goal is to reach it with support from FAMA loans.  This is the first loan María gets from FAMA and she expects to make her installment payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy clothes and shoes.

loans.name: Mohirakhon

texts.ru: Прекрасная девушка из Таджикистана нуждается вашей поддержки. Ее зовут Мохирахон и ей 18 лет. Она из семьи фермера. Ее родители занимаются скотоводством и их доход не достаточно для оплаты обучения Мохирахон в колледже, так как в этом году она поступила в медицинский колледж по специальности фармацевт. Она является студенткой 1 курса и должна оплатить годовой договор. Она запрашивает займ для оплаты обучения в колледже. Она ждет и надеется на вашу доброту.
texts.en: A beautiful young woman from Tajikistan needs your support. Her name is Mohirakhon and she is 18 years old. Mohirakhon comes from a farming family. Her parents raise livestock, and their income is insufficient to pay for their daughter's post-secondary studies. This year, Mohirakhon has entered a medical college to become a pharmacist and must now pay her first-year tuition, to which end she is requesting this loan. She awaits and hopes for your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for her college studies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy paint, sandpaper, solvents, paint rollers and other painting supplies.

loans.name: Maria Felipa

texts.es:
María, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo, para invertir en la compra de materia prima para el negocio, ya que depende de sus ventas de tortillas para poder realizar el dinero e invertirlo en las diferentes necesidades que se le presentan en el hogar, su compra será en maíz y leña, adquiriéndolo por mejor valor comprando de contado.
Su experiencia con el préstamo anterior ha sido muy favorable, ya que hasta el momento ha tenido lo necesario para realizar la venta, sus condiciones económicas no han incrementado mucho, sin embargo considera que es muy necesario este aporte para mantener sus ingresos.
texts.en:
María is requesting a new loan so that she can invest in supplies for her business. She depends on her tortilla sales to generate the money needed to pay for various household expenses. Her purchase will include corn and firewood. In order to obtain the best value, she will pay for these items with cash.

Her experience with her previous loan was very favorable. To this moment, she has what she needs to conduct her sales. Her financial condition has not improved much, but she still believes the loans are needed to help her maintain her source of income.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood.

loans.name: Jerinson Juan

texts.es:
Jerinson es un joven de 20 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Imperial con sus padres y hermanos, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un  gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Jerinson se encuentra estudiando la carrera de Mecánica Automotriz que tanto desea.
Con mucho empeño y entusiasmo, Jerinson trabaja como obrero de campo en una pequeña parcela cercana a su hogar, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 8 horas y cree que le va bien porque siempre le ha gustado el trabajo que se realiza en el campo.
Jerinson se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de sus materiales y herramientas de estudios, tales como: llaves, tuercas, desarmadores, entre otros; de esta manera Jerinson podrá realizar sus trabajos prácticos eficientemente, así él espera seguir estudiando y trabajando para convertirse en un buen profesional y así junto con su familia desea salir adelante.
texts.en:
Jerinson, 20, is single living in the city of Imperial with his parents and siblings.  He’s a very kind, hardworking, enthusiastic person who very much wants to improve.  Thanks to his parents’ efforts, Jerinson is studying auto mechanics like he so wants.

With much dedication and enthusiasm, Jerinson works as a field hand in a small parcel of land near his home.  He heads out to work very early in the morning every day.  He might work up to 8 hours daily and believes he does well because he’s always liked the work he does in the fields.

Jerinson is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to their support he will be able to buy materials and study tools like wrenches, nuts, screwdrivers, among others so that he can do his practices efficiently; he hopes to continue studying and working to become a good professional and wants to get ahead with his family.

loans.use: to buy supplies and study materials like wrenches, nuts, screwdrivers, etc.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 58 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, con sus hijos, lastimosamente hace poco tiempo sufrió la pérdida de su amado esposo, ahora ella es el mayor pilar de su familia y dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacarlos adelante; ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, María puso en marcha su pequeño negocio de venta de productos de belleza, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, ella puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación, por la variedad de productos que ofrece y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
María se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de productos de belleza, tales como maquillaje, cremas, perfumes, cosméticos, entre otros; de esta manera María tendrá su negocio mejor abastecido, así ella espera poder aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos para así poder mejor sus condición de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
María is a 58 year-old woman who lives in the city of Ica with her children. Unfortunately she suffered the lost of her dear husband a short while ago. Now she is the mainstay of the family and dedicates all her efforts to helping it get ahead. She is a very friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic person who greatly wants to succeed.

With much hard work and dedication, María started a small business selling beauty products. She starts work every day early in the morning and can work approximately 10 hours. She believes her business is doing well because of her dedication and the variety of products she offers, as well as because of her helpful service to her customers.

María is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to their help, she will be able to sell beauty products, such as foundations, creams, perfumes and cosmetics, among other items. Therefore she will have a better stocked business and expects to be able to increase her sales and earnings. In this way, she will be able to improve her and her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase beauty products, such as foundations, creams, perfumes and cosmetics..

loans.name: Sadridin

texts.ru: Садридин добрый и трудолюбивый человек.   Женат, воспитывает пятерых детей.   Его дети еще очень молоды старшему 20, а младшему всего 5 лет.   В течение нескольких лет он работал в колхозе и имел всего лишь одну корову с быком.   Тогда ему хватало на житье и он не в чем не нуждался .   А теперь когда дети выросли ему необходимо оплатить за университет старшего и остальных детей за школу.   Теперь Садридину пришлось арендовать землю несколько соток и выращивать помидор огурцы и другие овощи , которые он продает в течении всего урожая. Садридин обратился в Арванд потому что хочет развивать свой бизнес по откармливанию скота и на полученный кредит планирует купить несколько коров и откормив продать их в сезон.   Заранее благодарит за поддержку.
texts.en:
Sadridin is a kind and hard-working person. He is married and raising five children who are still quite young - the oldest is 20 while the youngest is only 5. For several years, Sadridin worked at a collective farm and kept only a single cow and a bull. At that time, his income was sufficient and all his needs were met. However, now that his children have grown, Sadridin must pay for his eldest child's university studies, and for schooling for the rest. He has been forced to rent a plot of land and use it to cultivate tomatoes, cucumbers and other vegetables for sale.

Sadridin has turned to MDO Arvand, LLC because he would like to develop his livestock business. He plans to use this loan to purchase several cows and then resell them during high season after fattening them. Sadridin thanks you in advance for your support.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es: Don Manuel , de oficio agricultor , originario de Esteli, se siente muy satisfecho y agradecido con los logros alcanzados con el primer préstamo Kiva, el cual utilizo para comprar insumos y pago de mano de obra para siembra de chiltomas, su producción fue muy buena . Ahora se esta preparando para el siguiente ciclo de siembra y es por esto que solicita un crédito para comprar insumos y pagar mano de obra para sembrar 2 manzanas de tomates. El espera que su producción de tomates sea de muy buena calidad y rendimiento , espera comprar tierras, maquinaria ,equipos agrícola  y seguir cultivando hortalizas.
texts.en:
Don Manuel is a farmer who is originally from Esteli. He is very pleased and grateful with what he accomplished with his first Kiva loan. Manuel used the money to buy supplies and pay for the labor required to plant bell peppers. His production level was very good.

Now he is preparing for another planting cycle. For this reason, he is requesting a loan in order to buy supplies and pay for labor required to plant two plots of tomatoes. He hopes that his tomato production will be fruitful and of very good quality. Manuel also hopes to buy more land, machinery, and farm equipment so that he can continue growing vegetables.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies and pay for labor in order to plant tomatoes.

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles Group

texts.es:
El comité “María de los Ángeles” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de  Santaní, ellas son personas muy trabajadoras que se esfuerzan al máximo por salir adelante y ayudar a sus familias.
Librada forma parte del grupo y comenta que se dedica a la venta ambulante de todo tipo de productos, como ser sabanas, frazadas, sobrecamas y demás, cuenta que su trabajo es muy sacrificado ya que tiene que recorrer por las calles.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de sabanas y sobrecamas, con lo cual podrá seguir trabajando y dando a su familia lo que necesitan para una vida digna.
texts.en:
The “María de Los Angeles” Communal Bank was formed when several neighbors in the city of Santani came together. They are very hardworking women who put forth all their effort to get ahead and help their families.

Librada is part of this group and notes that she is a street vendor, selling all kinds of products, such as sheets, blankets, bedspreads and other items. She adds that her work requires a lot of sacrifice because she has to go through the streets.

She is requesting the loan to purchase sheets and bedspreads so that she can continue working and giving her family what they need to lead a life of dignity.

loans.use: to purchase sheets and bedspreads.

loans.name: Khosiyat

texts.ru: Хосият жительница города Худжанд. Ей 38 лет. Она замужем. У нее двое детей. Ее дочь портниха, она занимается шитьем. Муж Хосият находится в Российской Федерации. Сама Хосият занимается шитьем национальных платьев. Этим видом деятельности она занимается на протяжении тринадцати лет. Хосият берет кредит для починки швейной машинки и покупки необходимых тканей.
texts.en: Khosiyat is a resident of the city of Khujand.  She is 38 years old, married and has two children.  Her daughter is a seamstress and is involved in sewing.  Khosiyat's husband is in the Russian Federation.  Khosiyat is involved in sewing national dresses.  She has been in this business for thirteen years.  Khosiyat is requesting this loan to repair her sewing machine and to purchase necessary fabrics.

loans.use: to repair her sewing machine and to purchase necessary fabrics

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her university education

loans.name: Makhfirat

texts.ru: Махфират проживает в городе Худжанд. Ей 36 лет. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Ее муж занимается посевом хлопка и пшеницы. Махфират портниха. Она более десяти лет предоставляет услугу у себя дома. Махфират занимается шитьем национальных платьев. Она мастерица, в этой области Махфират имеет богатый опыт. Она берет кредит для ремонта швейной машинки и покупки тканей.
texts.en: Makhfirat lives in the city of Khujand. She is 36 years old, married, and has three children. Makhfirat's husband is engaged in cultivating cotton and wheat, while she works as a seamstress. For over ten years, she has offered this service from her home, creating traditional dresses. Makhfirat is a master seamstress and has a wealth of experience in this line of work. She is taking this loan to repair her sewing machine and purchase fabrics.

loans.use: to repair her sewing machine and purchase fabrics

loans.name: Augusto Manuel

texts.es:
Augusto es un joven de 28 años de edad, vive al lado de su esposa y de su pequeño de 2 años de edad, a quien quiere mucho y por el cual cada día lucha con muchas fuerzas para poder darle una vida digna y sobre todo con mucho amor. Augusto vive en la ciudad de  Ica la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima muy cálido, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura, en especial el cultivo de algodón, uva, esparrago, entre otros.  Augusto es un hombre muy trabajador, y desde pequeño aprendió a ganarse el pan con el sudor de la frente, ya que sus padres eran muy humildes y tenía la necesidad de apoyarlos para poder solventar los gastos del hogar. Con mucho esfuerzo y ahorro augusto inicio su negocio de venta de manualidades y productos para artesanías como pinturas, entre otros, el trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 15 clientes al día y el cree que le va bien en su negocio por las ganas de salir adelante.

Augusto está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a su gran apoyo el podrá comprar mas mercadería para su negocio como pinturas acrílicas, cerámicas en frio, pinturas, entre otros, de esta manera el podrá tener mas mercadería para ofrecer a sus clientes y poder mejorar su ingresos, de esta manera el podrá seguir luchando y trabajando cada día para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una gran educación a su hijo y poder ser un gran empresario”.
texts.en:
Augusto, 28, is a young man living with his wife and two-year-old little boy who he loves very much and works hard for every day to provide with a dignified life that’s full of love above all.  Augusto lives in the city of Ica which is noted for having a very hot climate.  Agriculture is prevalent here too, especially cotton, grapes and asparagus, among others.  

Augusto is a very hardworking man who learned to earn his livelihood with the sweat from his brow since he was a boy because his parents were very humble and he needed to help them meet household expenses.  With much effort and savings Augusto started his own business selling crafts and crafts-making supplies like paint, among others.  He works around 10 hours daily and can tend to up to 15 customers per day.  He believes he does well in his business because of the drive he has to get ahead.

Augusto is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support they give him he will be able to buy merchandise like acrylic paint, clay and paint, among others, for his business.  In this way he will have more merchandise to offer his customers and to be able to improve his income.  In this way he will be able to continue striving and working daily to make his greatest dream reality:   to give his son an education and to be able to be a great businessman.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like acrylic paint, ceramic, paint, etc.

loans.name: Eleitino

texts.en: Eleitino is 64 years old and married with six children.  She has a plantation where she grows taro and banana that she sells in her community or at the market.  She has been doing this for five years.  Eleitino needs a loan to purchase fertilizers, a wheel barrel, weed eater, etc.  She has been a member of SPBD since 2009.  Eleitino will use the profits from her sales to save for children's education.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, weed killer, bush knives, and other necessities for her plantation.

loans.name: San Ramon Poty Group

texts.es:
Este comité San Ramón Poty esta integrado por 23 señoras con ganas de superarse economicamente. Son personas humildes madres de familias de escasos recursos que trabajan a diario para mantener a su familia para darles una dignidad de buena vida.
Maria Graciela, es integrante del grupo, ella se dedica al comercio, tiene una despensa, y también se dedica a la venta de carne de cerdo y gallina. Comenta que gracias a su negocio ella da lo mejor a su familia y tratan de tener una vida digna y sin necesidades.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de carne, bebidas, lácteos, y demás insumos para poder abastecer su local y dar  lo mejor a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The San Ramón Poty Communal Bank is made up of 23 ladies who are eager to succeed financially. They are modest women, mothers who have scarce resources and who work every day to support their families in order to give them good and worthwhile lives.

Maria Graciela is a member of the group. She is a merchant, owns a grocery store and also sells pork and chicken. She says that, thanks to her business, she gives the best to her family and tries to have a dignified life, without deprivation. She is requesting a loan to purchase meat, drinks, milk products and other supplies to stock her store and provide her clients with the best.

loans.use: to purchase meat,drinks, milk products and other supplies.

loans.name: Syinat

texts.ru:
Сыйнат  52 года, мать 3 детей. Сыйнат в качестве основного дохода с 1988 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы 7,000 сом, потраченной на покупку теленка. Благодаря упорному труду Сыйнат в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  1 дойная корова, 1 теленок,10 овец, ежемесячный доход составляет около 5,000 сом. Доходы от бизнеса позволяют Сыйнат оплачивать обучение дочери. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Сыйнат обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку 4 голов нетелей.  Доходы от кредита Сыйнат планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества домашней скотины, а на следующий год сделать капитальный ремонт дома.
texts.en: Syinat is 52 years old and a mother of three children.  To provide the primary source of income, she has been involved in animal husbandry since 1988, having started this business with a sum of 7,000 som, spent on buying a calf.  Thanks to Syinat's hard work, today her business contains one dairy cow, one calf and ten sheep, and the monthly income amounts to about 5,000 som.  The earnings from the business allow her to pay for her daughter's education.  In order to further develop her business, Syinat requested a loan in the amount of 130,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy four heifers.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further increasing domestic livestock quantities and making major repairs to her house next year.

loans.use: to buy four heifers

loans.name: Mavzuna

texts.ru: Мавзуне 19 лет. Она студентка 2 курса. Мавзуна учится в Худжандском  Государственном Университете по специальности Востоковед. Она учится на отлично и активно участвует в общественной жизни университета. В будущем она мечтает стать известном востоковедом. Она запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора в 2012-2013 учебного года. Так как ее родители не в состоянии оплатить за учебу Мавзуны, Вы являетесь единственными людьми, кто может подержать ее. Она ждет вашу доброту
texts.en: Mavzuna is 19 years old.  She is a second-year student of the Khujand State University, studying to become a scholar of Oriental studies.  She studies with excellence and actively participates in extracurricular activities at the university.  In the future, she dreams of becoming a famous orientalist.  She is requesting this loan to pay for her education contract for the 2012-2013 year.  Because her parents cannot pay for Mavzuna's education, you are the only people, who can support her.  She relies on your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for her university education

loans.name: Rano

texts.ru: Рано обратилась в нашу организацию за финансовой помощью так как хочет увеличить свое стадо.Она сельская женщина в возрасте 42 лет.  Замужем, имеет 3 детей.    С 2005 года кредитуется в нашей организации.  Во время кредитования показала себя с положительной стороны.  Очень отзывчивая,пунктуальная,добросовестная женщина.   В поисках источника дохода она начала свой бизнес в 2003 году по откармливанию скота.  По бизнесу помогает ей муж.   В наличие имеет более 45 голов скота и 50 шт кур,хорошей породы.  Каждый день продает более 45 шт яиц.   От полученного дохода от кур и скота  они поставили на ноги своих детей.   У них очень дружелюбная семья. На полученный кредит Рано  хочет купить несколько  голов скота и расширить свой бизнес.  Благодарит нашу организацию за поддержку.
texts.en:
Rano has turned to MDO Arvand, LLC for financial assistance as she would like to expand the size of her herd. She is 42 years old, married, has 3 children, and lives in the countryside. Rano has been Arvand's client since 2005 and has positively established herself as a responsive, punctual and honest woman.

While seeking a source of income, Rano started her livestock business in 2003 with the help of her husband. Presently, she keeps over 45 large animals and 50 chickens of a good breed and sells over 45 eggs each day. With the income from their business, Rano and her husband gave a good upbringing to their children and now have a happy family. Rano would like to use this loan to purchase additional livestock and expand her business. She thanks MDO Arvand, LLC for their support.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Tajy Punta Group

texts.es:
Este grupo de Mujeres Emprendedoras que lleva el nombre de  Tajy Punta, actualmente tiene 15 integrantes se encuentran en el 4° ciclo del programa de Comité de Mujeres de la Fundación Paraguaya .Este comité se caracteriza porque ser muy unido y responsable, practican la ayuda mutua y la solidaridad entre ellas, todas ellas cuentan con actividades emprendedoras actualmente.
Una de las historias que se destaca es el de la señora Cristina que se dedica a la confección de sábanas, trabajo en el cual le ayuda su hija Mabel, tiene una clientela formada ya que su marido y sus hijos se dedican a la venta de los productos por las zonas de Nemby, Mariano Roque Alonso, Villa Elisa y otros.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de telas e hilos para poder seguir confeccionando las sabanas que vende. Agradece por la oportunidad que ella y sus amigas están recibiendo.
texts.en:
This group of entrepreneurial women, named Tajy Punta, has 15 members and is currently in the 4th cycle of the Committee of Women of the Paraguayan Foundation (Comité de Mujeres de la Fundación Paraguaya). This group is characterized by their unity, responsibility, the practice of mutual help and their solidarity.  They all currently work in entrepreneurial activities.  
One story that stands out is that of Mrs. Cristina that works in sheet-making, a job that her daughter Mabel helps her with.  She has an established clientele since her husband and sons dedicate themselves to selling the products in the areas of Nemby, Mariano Roque Alonso, Villa Elisa and others.  
She is requesting this loan to purchase fabrics and threads in order to continue making the sheets that she sells.  She is grateful for the opportunity that her and her friends are receiving.

loans.use: to purchase fabric and thread to make sheets.

loans.name: Sagrada Familia Group

texts.es:
El comité Sagrada Familia es de la ciudad de Carapeguá, se encuentra en el 1º ciclo con 11 integrantes, son mujeres que tienen deseo y ganas de superación por medio de sus actividades cotidianas para solventar los gastos de la familia.
La Sra. Etelvina es una de ellas  su labor de todos los días se basa en venta de comestibles de forma ambulante por la tarde La Sra. Etelvina solicita el crédito para la compra de carne, verduras, condimentos y demás insumos para poder seguir vendiendo los alimentos que prepara.
texts.en: The Sagrada Familia committee is from the city of Carapegua, and is in its first loan cycle with 11 members.  They are women who have a wish and a desire to get ahead through their daily activities in order to pay their family's expenses.  Etelvina is one of them.  She works every afternoon as a mobile food vendor.  Etelvina is requesting a loan to buy meat, vegetables, condiments and other supplies in order to be able to continue selling the food that she prepares.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables, condiments and other supplies.

loans.name: Kanyua

texts.en: Kanyua is a mother of three children of school going ages. She has practiced farming actively for the last 20 years, and this is the main source of income for her family. She is currently producing maize, bananas, peas and milk, which she sells at the local market. She runs her farm with the help of one farmhand. Kanyua has requested a loan of 62,400 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow. She hopes to triple her milk production, which currently stands at eight litres per day. She says a major part of her farming income will go into educating her children. She remains grateful to Juhudi Kilimo for making loans accessible to smallholder farmers. She however notes that the high cost of feeds remains a major challenge.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Mpira

texts.en:
Mpira is a hard-working married woman with four children living in Masindi, Uganda. After realising that the whole family could not depend on her husband's meager wages, she decided to set up a restaurant.

Since she deals with fresh foods, Mpira is challenged by the high rate of perishability and lack of appropriate storage facilities. She is requesting this loan to buy a deep freezer for her restaurant.

Her dream is to educate her children up to the university level although she did not go to school. Her business desire is a hotel.

loans.use: to buy a deep freezer for her restaurant.

loans.name: Moini Paul

texts.en:
Moini is a 28-year-old businesswoman who lives in Juba. She is married and has two children ages two and five. One of them goes to school. 

Moini sells clothes, and has been in business for five years. She has no employees. She heard about Finance Sudan through other clients. She is taking a loan of 1500 Sudanese Pounds (SDG) to purchase clothes, sandals and many others. This business is her only source of income. 

In five years moini would like to expand her business. Her major challenges include high prices in the market. 

Moini says she is happy for the loans given by Finance Sudan through the help of kiva.

loans.use: for buying more items like clothes, sandals etc.

loans.name: Primitivo

texts.es:
Con un préstamo de 15,900 pesos Primitivo ha podido comprar una tostadora grande, una licuadora, jamón, queso, pan, vegetales y otros materiales para su cafeteria.
Hace una año que Primitivo abrió su cafetería, motivado por su hermana, quien siempre le ha dicho que él hace los sandwiches más ricos que ella haya provado. 
Primitivo es divorciado, tiene un hijo de 23 años y una nieta. Él desea que su negocio prospere y se consolide en su comunidad, para así garantizar el tener un medio de sustento sostenible.
texts.en:
Primitivo was able to use a 15,900 peso loan to buy a large toaster, a blender, ham, cheese, bread, vegetables and other supplies for his snack bar.  Primitivo opened his snack bar a year ago encouraged by his sister who has always told him that he makes the most delicious sandwiches she’s ever tasted.

Primitivo is divorced and has a 23-year-old son and a granddaughter.   He wants his business to make progress and become well-established in the community so that he can be sure to have a sustainable means of support.

loans.use: to buy a large toaster, a blender, ham, cheese, bread, vegetables and other supplies.

loans.name: Damas Del Barrio San Antonio Group

texts.es:
Damas del Barrio de San Antonio es de la ciudad de San Lorenzo, son 15 mujeres que se fijaron el crecimiento de todas ellas, no solo en lo económico, sino también en lo personal.
La Sra. Lucia, presidenta del grupo, es una mujer casada, tiene  6 hijos, es una mujer muy activa y promueve el fortalecimiento del comité, motivándolas y apoyándolas en todo lo que puede. Ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, y solicita el crédito para la compra de frutas y verduras de todo tipo, y así poder surtirse y ofrecer una buena variedad a sus clientes.
Agradece la oportunidad que ella y sus compañeras reciben, ya que así podrán salir adelante y progresar.
texts.en: Damas del Barrio de San Antonio is from the city of San Lorenzo.  They are 15 women who have set as an objective the growth of all of them, not only economically but personally.  Lucia, the president of the group, is a married woman with 6 children.  She is a very active woman who promotes the strengthening of the committee, motivating and supporting them in all that she can.  She works selling fruits and vegetables, and is requesting a loan to buy fruits and vegetables of all kinds, in order to supply herself and offer a good variety to her customers.  She is grateful for the opportunity that she and her colleagues are receiving, as with it they will be able to move forward and progress.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Safari

texts.en:
Safari is a 42 year old charcoal seller in Kisauni, Mombasa. He is married to Judith and blessed with five children. He has been selling charcoal for the past year with success.

This is Safari’s first business loan from KADET LTD to finance his business. He plans to purchase more sacks of charcoal to resell to his customers in Kisauni.

He will use the anticipated profits to expand his business further. He hopes to have a bigger, more profitable business.

loans.use: To purchase more sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy computers for the school she owns.

loans.name: A.c.

texts.en:
A.C. is 50 years old, and lives in Airport Community. She is married, and her husband is a businessman. They have six children between the ages of 10 and 30 years old; three are currently in school and live at home, while the others are living on their own. 

For the past 26 years, A.C. has been selling bread. She makes a good profit because she has many customers.  This is her second time requesting a loan to purchase more flour, sugar, oil, and butter for her business. Her plan is to build a bakery, and to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more flour, sugar, oil, and butter for her business

loans.name: Rufio

texts.en:
As a married father of three children, Rufio works hard to support his family.

He has a firewood retail business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising livestock.  Rufio is borrowing PHP 15000 through NWTF to purchase more stocks of firewoods to sell.

Rufio has been sustaining his business activities through the past 13 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva.  He hopes that his hard work will help him attain his dream which is to save enough to provide a secure future for his family.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of firewood to sell.

loans.name: Maha

texts.en: Maha is a 37 year old married woman who has one family member.  She is from Al Russeifeh Jordan and is requesting a loan of 400 JD to pay for home improvements.  Maha would like to buy a new refrigerator as well.  In the future, she hopes to buy new furniture to improve her socioeconomic status.

loans.use: to pay for her home improvements.

loans.name: Alpaquitas - 26 Group

texts.es: El Banco de Emprendimiento ALPAQUITAS - 26 está compuesta por ocho integrantes de los cuales siete son mujeres y un varón que se dedican a distintas actividades, la presidenta del banco es la  Sra. Brenda tiene 39 años, ella se dedica a tejido de chompas y mantas de Alpaca para las mujeres de pollera, ella vive en la zona de Sopocachi  este préstamo es su segunda secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Brenda  va a usar este préstamo para la compra de lana de alpaca por mayor para el tejido de sus chompas y mantas ya que por esta fechas tiene mucha venta también entrega pedidos a los distintos mercados de la ciudad de El Alto, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es incremento de capital de trabajo, la Sra. Brenda enfrenta retos en su negocio que son surtir su mercadería y va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir comprando lana por mayor. En la Foto una de las socias esta acompañada de sus esposo.
texts.en: The ALPAQUITAS - 26 communal bank is made up of eight members, among whom are seven women and one man, who work at a variety of activities.  The president of the bank is Brenda, who is 39 years old and who works knitting sweaters and blankets from alpaca for women.  She lives in the Sopocachi zone, and this loan is her second one through this organization.  Brenda will use the loan to buy alpaca wool wholesale to make her sweaters and blankets because these days she has a lot of sales.  She is also placing orders with the different markets in the city of El Alto.  Her reason for requesting this loan is to add to her stock.  Brenda is encountering obstacles in her business in supplying herself with merchandise, and will use the loan proceeds to continue buying wool wholesale.  In the photo one of the members is accompanied by her husband.

loans.use: to buy wool wholesale.

loans.name: Edwina

texts.en:
This is Edwina, 43, a resident of Dasmariñas, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Alfredo, a vendor, and a mother to her children. She and her husband manage their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Edwina operates a school/office supplies business where one can buy school supplies including pens, bond paper, cartolina and the like. She gets the supplies at wholesale prices and sells them by the piece. Her store is located adjacent to her house, and her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of Php 500 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, Edwina is requesting a Php 17,000 loan to buy school supplies to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.

Edwina dreams of having a vehicle that she can use in her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for more stocks of office/school supplies needed in her business.

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en: Marivic is 48 years old and is married to Rolando. The couple is thankful because they have been blessed with four children. They all live in the village of Sillawit. Marivic has a retail store based in their home. She has been doing this for three years and earns about PHP 300 a day. At this time, Marivic is asking for a loan in the amount of PHP 7,000 to buy canned goods, noodles, assorted bread, and condiments to sell. She would like to make the business more profitable in order to earn funds for the college education of her children. When they earn degrees, they will find good jobs for the welfare of their own lives someday.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, noodles, assorted bread, and condiments to sell

loans.name: Elizabeth Wanja

texts.en:
Elizabeth is a young, single mother who lives in Thika town with her 3-year-old daughter. She lives in a small single room at the rural outskirts of Thika. 

Elizabeth is a vegetable farmer and also works as a casual laborer at a tea farm. Elizabeth earns approximately $2 per day. Every day she spends approximately 20% of her income on firewood for cooking and lighting, leaving her with very little money for her other basic needs. In addition to being energy inefficient, her current cookstove, which emits a lot of smoke, is hazardous to her and her child's health. Elizabeth is therefore taking a loan for a more efficient cookstove.

With this cookstove she will be able to reduce her firewood consumption by half. With the money she saves, plus her earnings from the tea estate and sales from her vegetable farm, she will be able to repay the loan and have a higher quality life.

loans.use: To purchase an improved firewood cook stove

loans.name: Alba

texts.es: Doña Alba, tiene 45 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 4 hijos y vive en el municipio de San Pedro Sula, Cortes junto a tres de sus hijos. Doña Alba tiene su propio negocio, desde hace 10 años estableció una pequeña pulpería donde vende productos de la canasta básica familiar. Ella vende arroz, frijoles, harina, azúcar, manteca, huevos, café, pan, dulces, sal, productos de limpieza, churros y refrescos. Este negocio ha sido su fuente de ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia. Con el préstamo que solicita que es por 6,000 Lempiras  va surtir la pulpería de productos alimenticios y así mantendrá a sus clientes satisfechos. su plan es seguir trabajando y manteniendo surtido el negocio para que le genere sus ingresos.
texts.en: Alba, 45, is a single mother; she has four children and lives in the town of San Pedro Sula, Cortes, with three of her children.  Alba has a business of her own; she opened a grocery store ten years ago where she sells basic staple items. She sells rice, beans, flour, sugar, lard, eggs, coffee, bread, candy, salt, cleaning supplies, snacks and soft-drinks.  This store has been her source of income to support her family.  She will use the 6,000 Lempira loan she’s requesting to stock her store with food items to keep her customers satisfied.  Her plan is to continue working and keeping the store well-stocked so that it will generate income.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Izzatullo

texts.ru: Человек с огромным сердцем доброты и прекрасной душой, который живет среди высоких Таджикских гор, нуждается вашей поддержки, так как последние время у него проблемы с финансами. Его зовут Изатулло. Ему 55  лет, женат и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Климат его местожительство весьма благополучный для выращивания сельхоз культур, а также для скотоводства. Более 7  лет он занимается скотоводством. У него несколько  коровы и   барана. У него большой огород, где выращивает сено для скота. Он продает молоко своим соседям и соседи очень довольны от полученного натурального молочного продукта. Еще он продает скот, за которым он присматривался в течение нескольких месяцев. На рынке у него много клиентов. Изатулло хочет развивать свой бизнес, но не имеет достаточного средства для этого. Он запрашивает кредит на сумму 1000 долларов США для покупки скота, чтобы развевать бизнес. С полученного  дохода он собирается обеспечить своих детей современными технологиями. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
A man with a huge kind heart and a beautiful soul, who lives among the tall Tajik mountains, needs your support as he has encountered financial difficulties. His name is Izzatullo. He is 55 years old, married, and raising 4 children. The climate around his home is very favourable for crop and animal farming. Izzatullo has been raising livestock for over 7 years and currently keeps several cows and sheep. He also has a large parcel of land where he grows grass for his animals. Izzatullo sells milk to his neighbours, who are happy to receive his natural dairy. Additionally, Izzatullo sells livestock after taking care of it for several months, and has many customers at the market.

Izzatullo would like to develop his business but does not have sufficient funds for doing so. He is requesting a loan of US$1000 to purchase livestock in order to expand his business. He plans to use his profits to provide his children with modern technology. Izzatullo is counting on your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase soft drinks, juice, bottled water, snacks, and cookies.

loans.name: Ruperto Timoteo

texts.es:
Ruperto tiene 48 años de edad, es casado y junto a su esposa tiene 4 hijos de los cuales 3 ya son mayores y solo viven con el menor de todos quien se encuentra estudiando educación secundaria, Ruperto es muy trabajador y cada día se esfuerza mucho para poder darle un buen ejemplo y salir adelante. Su vivienda de Ruperto se ubica en la ciudad de Imperial, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima muy variado, se desarrolla también la agricultura en especial el cultivo de manzana, maíz, entre otros. Ruperto se dedica  ala agricultura desde hace mas de 10 años, ya que desde muy joven sus padres le enseñaron el arte de sembrar la tierra como nos comenta, Ruperto ha sembrado anteriormente papa, camote, ají, pallar, frejol, entre otros; pero actualmente ha sembrado frejol, él le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 9 horas al día y siempre tiene el apoyo de su esposa y por ello el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque le gusta lo que hace y porque tiene el apoyo de su esposa y sus hijos.

Ruperto esta muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá a comprar abono y fertilizantes, con lo cual podrá tener un cultivo en buenas condiciones, así el podrá mejorar sus ingresos y podrá tener una buena cosecha, así seguirá luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a su menor hijo y poder terminar de construir su casa de material noble ya que actualmente es de adobe”.
texts.en:
Ruperto, 48, is married and he and his wife have four children three of which are already adults; they only live with their youngest one who is attending secondary school.  Ruperto is very hardworking and strives daily very much in order to set a good example for him and to get ahead.  

Ruperto’s house is located in the city of Imperial which is noted for its very varied climate.  Agriculture too takes place here especially apples and corn, among others.  Ruperto has worked in agriculture for more than ten years since his parents taught him the art of planting when he was very young.  Ruperto has grown potatoes, sweet potatoes, peppers, lima beans, broad beans, among others in the past but he’s currently planted broad beans.  He spends about nine hours per day at work and his wife always supports his efforts.  He thinks he does so well in his business because he likes what he does and because he has his wife’s and his children’s support.

Ruperto is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they are giving him he will be able to buy manure and fertilizer to have a crop that’s in good condition.  He will thus be able to improve his income and have good crop yields and will continue striving daily to make his greatest dream reality: to provide a good education for his youngest son and to finish building his house out of substantial materials since it’s currently adobe.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer.

loans.name: Zuhur

texts.en:
Zuhur is 27, married, and the father of 2 children, ages 1 and 3.

He works as electrician in a organization for 6 years. Thanks to his good experience in this field he works successfully but has a small salary. It does not allow him to provide for the needs of his family and repair his house because his family needs are greater with the two young children. He is asking for a loan of 5000 somoni to buy building materials as slate, wood, cement for repairing his house.

This loan will help him buy building materials to repair his house. In this way he will provide high quality living conditions for his family and put an end to the problems with the house.

loans.use: To buy building materials including slate, wood, and cement for repairing his house

loans.name: Elibar Indalecio

texts.es:
Elibar, es un hombre de 50 años, soltero, cursó estudios secundarios, que vive con sus padres en la ciudad de Santo Domingo, la capital de la Provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, una provincia de Ecuador que en los últimos años ha tenido un alto crecimiento sostenido. Su capital  es una ciudad en donde lo más atractivo y llamativo son sus deliciosas frutas, y muchos lugares turísticos por visitar. También cuenta con un comercio considerable  ya que se ha convertido en un puerto terrestre de intercambio comercial entre las regiones Sierra y Costa del país. Además cuenta con varios atractivos turísticos que acompañados de su clima cálido son muy concurridos por turistas nacionales y extranjeros. 
Los padres de Elibar le enseñaron la actividad de criar animales para su posterior comercialización desde muy niño, y hace 25 años Elibar se dedicó por completo a este negocio que ha crecido a través de los años y al cual le dedica las horas que sean necesarias en el día sin importar el horario, sin embargo, él comenta que hay muchas pérdidas cuando los animales se enferman, es por eso que solicitó un préstamo en Fundación Alternativa para poder comprar insumos para el mejor cuidado de sus animales y además comprar más animales para incrementar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Elibar, 50, is single.  He attended secondary school and lives with his parents in the city of Santo Domingo, capital of Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas Province, a province in Ecuador that in recent years has had quite a bit of sustained growth.  Its capital is a city whose most attractive and eye-catching features is the fruit and the many tourist sites to visit.  It also has considerable commerce since it’s become a land port for commercial interaction between the mountains and the coastal regions of the country.  It also has many tourist attractions which when added to its hot climate makes it very popular with both national and international tourists alike.

Elibar’s parents taught him when he was still a boy to raise animals for subsequent sale.  Twenty-five years ago Elibar went into this business full-time and over the years it’s grown.  He puts in however many hours are necessary with no fixed schedule.  However, he comments that losses are big when animals get sick which is why he’s called on Fundación Alternativa for a loan to buy supplies to improve the care of his animals and also to buy more animals to increase his income.

loans.use: to buy animals and animal feed.
